item.title: Privacy
item.description: Privacy Policy What we collect We may collect the following information: Name Matriculation Number Email Address Dietary / Allergy Information What we do with the information we gather We collect the information above to keep track of our members and their needs. Additionally, should you opt in to receive our newsletter, we pass your email address on to our newsletter platform MailChimp. You may view MailChimp’s privacy policy here.
